Description:
Detects suspicious use of the WSMAN provider without PowerShell.exe as the host application.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Non PowerShell WSMAN COM Provider
Query: sourcetype='windows-powershell-classic' eql select * from _source_ where (data like '%providername=wsman%' and  not ((data like '%hostapplication=powershell%' or data like '%hostapplication=c:\windows\system32\windowspowershell\v1.0\powershell%' or data like '%hostapplication=c:\windows\syswow64\windowspowershell\v1.0\powershell%' or data like '%hostapplication=c:/windows/system32/windowspowershell/v1.0/powershell%' or data like '%hostapplication=c:/windows/syswow64/windowspowershell/v1.0/powershell%') or data re 'HostId=[a-zA-Z0-9-]{36}\s+EngineVersion='))
